def calculate_coziness(t, test_cases):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, m, segments) = case
        x = 0
        for segment in segments:
            (l, r, x1) = segment
            x = x | x1
        coziness = x * pow(2, n - 1, MOD) % MOD
        results.append(coziness)
    return results
